thread.title: Marlene Hering
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Marlene Hering

author: Marlene Hering
title: Marlene Hering
text: Kyle was very patient and showed us the spot I had reserved and was able to accommodate us with more space as the one spot I had was not large enough. He also was very helpful when I returned and could not open the door and then also provided a longer string for us to reach the light (we are a little short).
